mfa.title: Two-Factor Authentication
mfa.setupDesc: Use an authenticator app like Google Authenticator or Authy to generate verification codes.
mfa.verifyDesc: Enter the code from your authenticator app
mfa.scanQR: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app
mfa.enterCode: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app:
mfa.successDesc: Your account is now protected with TOTP-based two-factor authentication.
mfa.codeLengthError: The code must be exactly 6 digits
mfa.codeHelp: Open your authenticator app and enter the current 6-digit code.
mfa.qrCodeAlt: MFA QR Code - scan with authenticator app
mfa.secretKey: Or enter this secret key manually:
mfa.invalidCredentials: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
mfa.emailNotConfirmed: Please confirm your email before signing in.
mfa.networkError: Network error. Check your internet connection.
mfa.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

gdpr.exportDescription: Download a copy of all your personal data stored in CashPilot.
gdpr.exportInfo: Under GDPR Article 20, you have the right to receive your personal data in a structured, commonly used format. Click below to download a JSON file containing all your data.
gdpr.exportSuccessDesc: Your data has been downloaded successfully.
gdpr.exportError: Failed to export data. Please try again.
gdpr.dangerZoneDescription: Irreversible actions that affect your account permanently.
gdpr.deleteWarning1: Remove all your personal data, invoices, clients, projects, and files
gdpr.deleteWarning3: Revoke access to all shared data
gdpr.deleteConfirmDescription: This action is permanent and cannot be reversed. All your data, invoices, clients, projects, and uploaded files will be permanently deleted from our servers in compliance with GDPR.
gdpr.accountDeletedDesc: Your account and all associated data have been permanently deleted.
gdpr.deleteError: Failed to delete account. Please try again or contact support.
